casebody.data:
Lloyd D. FISHER, Jr., Petitioner, v. OFFICE OF PERSONNEL MANAGEMENT, Respondent. No. 2006-3324. United States Court of Appeals, Federal Circuit. March 15, 2007. Lloyd D. Fisher, Jr., pro se.

Before LOURIE, Circuit Judge, RADER, Circuit Judge, and BRYSON, Circuit Judge.

ORDER

A petition for rehearing having been filed by the Petitioner,

UPON CONSIDERATION THEREOF, it is

*996ORDERED that the petition for rehearing be, and the same hereby is, DENIED.

The mandate of the court will issue on March 22, 2007.
